title: Kourtney Kardashian knows how to get air into her vagina and we are astounded
text:
Kourtney’s talent was revealed on the latest episode of Keeping Up With The Kardashians (Picture: Getty Images)

Kourtney Kardashian has revealed that she has a very secret hidden talent.

The reality star is apparently able to get air into her vagina and queef the ABCs.

Kourtney’s interesting skill was revealed by her younger sister, Khloe Kardashian, on the most recent episode of Keeping Up With The Kardashians as they and a few pals enjoyed a luxury getaway in the Caribbean.

‘My favourite thing about Kourt – Kourtney can queef the ABCs,’ Khloe said.

‘That’s a lie,’ one of their friends responded.

But Kourtney reassured everyone that it was true. ‘Let’s do it tonight!’ she responded.

Khloe later elaborated on how Kourtney learnt how to do such a talent.

Khloe revealed Kourtney’s unusual talent on Keeping Up With The Kardashians (Picture: Getty)

‘She learned how to do it at sleep-away camp, everybody!’

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘Do you need air pushed in there first?’ someone else chipped in. Kourtney bluntly responded: ‘I know how to get the air in.’

That is quite simply something.

Kourtney’s revelation comes after she got into an explosive argument with younger sister Kim Kardashian on the show – with the girls’ mother, Kris Jenner, reportedly fearing it would spark an ‘all-out feud’.

The drama started after Kourtney admitted that ‘she wouldn’t care’ if their reality show came to an end, with Kim later throwing a sweet at her older sister.

‘Kim could be the biggest f*****g evil person on the planet,’ Kourtney can be heard saying in a voiceover.

The row left Kris reportedly concerned, who tries to play ‘peacemaker’ when it comes to their squabbles.

‘The girls do fight very dirty. They don’t hold back and often say very hurtful things,’ a source told Hollywood Life.

‘If they don’t have each other they have nothing. One of Kris’ biggest fears is that they’ll get into some sort of ugly family feud.’

Keeping Up With The Kardashians airs Sundays on E!

description: Kourtney Kardashian has a secret hidden talent - she knows how to get air into her vagina and queef the ABCs.
